FuncDef: This optional command associates an enqueuing priority with the static route. The options are either high or low, with low being the default. This parameter has the ability to affect the likelihood that a packet will be enqueued at SAP ingress in the face of ingress congestion.

ParaDef.Info: Setting the enqueuing parameter for a packet to low decreases the likelihood of enqueuing the packet when the ingress queue is congested. Ingress enqueuing priority only affects ingress SAP queuing. Once the packet is placed in a buffer on the ingress queue, the significance of the enqueuing priority is lost.

Setting the enqueuing parameter for a packet to high increases the likelihood of enqueuing the packet when the ingress queue is congested. Ingress enqueuing priority only affects ingress SAP queuing. Once the packet is placed in a buffer on the ingress queue, the significance of the enqueuing priority is lost..
